May be used in radial studies with more than two cells in the direction to represent flow across the 360 degree to 0 degree boundary.
May be used in local radial grid refinement runs to complete the circle.
May be used to enter a non-neighbor transmissibility between any two cells in the reservoir. In ECLIPSE 300 this is further enhanced with the NNCGEN keyword.
May be used to specify a coupling parameter for NNCs set up in Dual Porosity runs. The use of this is discussed in 'Dual Porosity' in the ECLIPSE Technical Description.
May be used to specify a different coupling parameter for gravity drainage. By default, the SIGMA values are used.
Specifies how missing zero thickness layers are to be treated. NNCs may be generated across the absent layer.
Connects a numerical aquifer to the reservoir using NNCs.

Activates Leverett J-Function option to scale capillary pressure according to rock porosity and permeability.

Activates Leverett J-Function option to scale capillary pressure according to rock porosity and permeability on a per saturation region basis. Each set of saturation function tables may be specified to use either capillary pressures values obtained from direct table look-up or via the Leverett J-Function calculation.
